Act-Phrase is a simple game that you can play at any get-together.
 1.)Make Everyone sit in a circle in which each alternate member is in the same team.
2.)Start the game a word appears on the screen You have to enact it and help your teammate guess the word without directly 
-Saying The Word 
-Saying any Rhyming Word
 3.)On Successful guess, Tap the Screen, Word changes and pass the device to other team when the time expires there will be a beep stop and the team holding the device gets eliminated and is given a dare to perform.
 4.) See The Above Video to understand better. Hope You Enjoy It.
